1.name: Back to the Future
1.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

2.name: The Goonies
2.description: A group of young misfits who call themselves The Goonies discover an ancient map and set out on a quest to find a legendary pirate's long-lost treasure.

3.name: Clue
3.description: Six guests are anonymously invited to a strange mansion for dinner, but after their host is killed, they must cooperate with the staff to identify the murderer as the bodies pile up.

4.name: Rambo: First Blood Part II
4.description: John Rambo is released from prison by the government for a top-secret covert mission to the last place on Earth he'd want to return - the jungles of Vietnam.

5.name: The Breakfast Club
5.description: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.

6.name: Legend
6.description: A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness from both destroying daylight and marrying the woman he loves.

7.name: Silverado
7.description: A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

8.name: Commando
8.description: A retired Special Forces colonel tries to save his daughter, who was abducted by his former subordinate.

9.name: Rocky IV
9.description: Rocky Balboa proudly holds the world heavyweight boxing championship, but a new challenger has stepped forward: Drago, a six-foot-four, 261-pound fighter who has the backing of the Soviet Union.

10.name: Teen Wolf
10.description: An ordinary high school student discovers that his family has an unusual pedigree when he finds himself turning into a werewolf.

11.name: Pale Rider
11.description: A mysterious preacher (Clint Eastwood) protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

12.name: Fright Night
12.description: A teenager discovers that the newcomer in his neighborhood is a vampire, so he turns to an actor in a television horror show for help dealing with the undead.

13.name: Weird Science
13.description: Two high school nerds use a computer program to literally create the perfect woman, but she turns their lives upside down.

14.name: The Return of the Living Dead
14.description: When two bumbling employees at a medical supply warehouse accidentally release a deadly gas into the air, the vapors cause the dead to rise again as zombies.

15.name: Brazil
15.description: A bureaucrat, in a retro-future world, tries to correct an administrative error and becomes an enemy of the state.

16.name: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome
16.description: After being exiled from the most advanced town in post apocalyptic Australia, a drifter travels with a group of abandoned children to rebel against the town's queen.

17.name: Mask
17.description: A teenager with a massive facial skull deformity and biker gang mother attempt to live as normal a life as possible under the circumstances.

18.name: Idi i smotri
18.description: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

19.name: St. Elmo's Fire
19.description: A group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood.

20.name: Return to Oz
20.description: Dorothy, saved from a psychiatric experiment by a mysterious girl, is somehow called back to Oz when a vain witch and the Nome King destroy everything that makes the magical land beautiful.

21.name: Witness
21.description: When a young Amish boy is sole witness to a murder, policeman John Book goes into hiding in Amish country to protect him until the trial.

22.name: House
22.description: A troubled writer moves into a haunted house after inheriting it from his aunt.

23.name: A View to a Kill
23.description: An investigation of a horse-racing scam leads 007 to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.

24.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street Part 2: Freddy's Revenge
24.description: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by deceased child murderer Freddy Krueger, who is out to possess him in order to continue his reign of terror in the real world.

25.name: After Hours
25.description: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho who he met that evening at a coffee shop.

26.name: The Color Purple
26.description: A black Southern woman struggles to find her identity after suffering abuse from her father and others over four decades.

27.name: Flesh+Blood
27.description: In medieval Europe, a young girl from a noble family is obsessed with her captors--commoners.

28.name: Re-Animator
28.description: After an odd new medical student arrives on campus, a dedicated local and his girlfriend become involved in bizarre experiments centering around the re-animation of dead tissue.

29.name: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment
29.description: When a new gang moves into town it's up to the screwball police team to stop them.

30.name: National Lampoon's European Vacation
30.description: The Griswolds win a vacation tour across Europe where the usual havoc ensues.

31.name: A Room with a View
31.description: In a Florence pensione circa 1900 with English guests, George and his dad offer their rooms with views to Lucy and her chaperone. Lucy and George get acquainted but Lucy returns to England. George and Lucy meet again but now she's engaged.

32.name: Out of Africa
32.description: In 20th-century colonial Kenya, a Danish baroness/plantation owner has a passionate love affair with a free-spirited big-game hunter.

33.name: Ran
33.description: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

34.name: Better Off Dead...
34.description: A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

35.name: Friday the 13th: A New Beginning
35.description: Still haunted by his past, Tommy Jarvis - who, as a child, killed Jason Voorhees - wonders if the serial killer is connected to a series of brutal murders occurring in and around the secluded halfway house where he now lives.

36.name: Ladyhawke
36.description: The thief Gaston escapes dungeon of medieval Aquila thru the latrine. Soldiers are about to kill him when Navarre saves him. Navarre, traveling with his spirited hawk, plans to kill the bishop of Aquila with help from Gaston.

37.name: Red Sonja
37.description: The fearless female warrior Red Sonja sets out to avenge her family's murder and rid her kingdom of the tyrannical rule of evil Queen Gedren.

38.name: Perfect
38.description: A female aerobics instructor meets a male reporter doing a story on health clubs, but it isn't love at first sight.

39.name: Explorers
39.description: A boy obsessed with 50s sci-fi movies about aliens has a recurring dream about a blueprint of some kind, which he draws for his inventor friend. With the help of a third kid, they follow it and build themselves a spaceship. Now what?

40.name: Young Sherlock Holmes
40.description: When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes (Nicholas Rowe) decides to investigate.

41.name: Day of the Dead
41.description: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.

42.name: Cocoon
42.description: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigor.

43.name: Silver Bullet
43.description: A werewolf terrorizes a small city where lives the paralytic Marty Coslaw, his uncle, and his sister, the story's narrator.

44.name: To Live and Die in L.A.
44.description: A fearless Secret Service agent will stop at nothing to bring down the counterfeiter who killed his partner.

45.name: Just One of the Guys
45.description: Terry feels discriminated against when the summer jobs at Sun Tribune go to 2 guys. She decides to do something about it. She dresses like a guy and gets a haircut. Will students at the other high school notice? Girls notice "him".

46.name: Lifeforce
46.description: A race of space vampires arrives in London and infects the populace, beginning an apocalyptic descent into chaos.

47.name: Pee-wee's Big Adventure
47.description: When eccentric man-child Pee-wee Herman gets his beloved bike stolen in broad daylight, he sets out across the U.S. on the adventure of his life.

48.name: The Stuff
48.description: A delicious, mysterious goo that oozes from the earth is marketed as the newest dessert sensation, but the tasty treat rots more than teeth when zombie-like snackers who only want to consume more of the strange substance at any cost begin infesting the world.

49.name: Dèmoni
49.description: A group of random people are invited to a screening of a mysterious movie, only to find themselves trapped in the theater with ravenous demons.

50.name: Fletch
50.description: Irwin M. "Fletch" Fletcher is a newspaper reporter being offered a large sum to off a cancerous millionaire, but is on the run, risking his job and finding clues when it's clear the man is healthy.
